Options only applicable when using REST transport (2.9.0)

Options only applicable when using REST transport

These Options are used with libraries that either only support REST transport, or with libraries where the user has elected to enable gRPC to HTTP transcoding.

Classes

  • google::cloud::QuotaUserOption
  • google::cloud::UserIpOption
  • google::cloud::ServerTimeoutOption
{% endverbatim %}
